title: Abdullah Balideh
text:
Abdullah Dor Mohammad Balideh Baloushi (born 14 February 1970) is a <a href="Qatar">Qatar</a>i <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Referee%20%28association%20football%29">referee</a> who has been a full international referee for <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a>.
Balideh became a FIFA referee in 2005. He served as a referee in the <a href="2010%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28AFC%29">2010</a> and <a href="2014%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28AFC%29">2014 FIFA World Cup qualifiers</a>, as well as the <a href="Football%20at%20the%202011%20Pan%20Arab%20Games">Pan Arab Games</a>.
